Extension Name¶

Extension name:webconsulting FTP transfer

What does it do?¶

This extension allows you to create a scheduler task which is responsible for transfering files in a directory locally or to/from an FTP account. All configuration is done from within the task configuration form. A transfer task requires a source location and a target location. When the task gets executed it will transfer all files which can be found at the source location to the target location. The source location and also the target location can be a local directory or a directory on a FTP server.

The scheduler task configuration form for a webcon FTP transfer task
